mosinstall.name: HP ToDo List
mosinstall.author: Hackwar
mosinstall.description:
This module implements a ToDo list into the tabs in the admin area.
Publish to CPANEL position, set "Install the DB" to yes, load the backend homepage ONCE and then set the option back to no.

www.mypapenberg.de

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: personifiedlist
param.label: Allow user specific entries
param.description: If set to yes, you can assign ToDo-entries to a privat list

param.name: superadmin
param.label: SuperAdmin edit
param.description: If set to yes, a SuperAdmin can add entries to a users list

param.name: showothers
param.label: Show other users entries
param.description: If set to yes, a SuperAdmin has access to the list entries of other users.

param.name: prioritize
param.label: Allow prioritization
param.description: If set to yes, you can give an entry a priority.

param.name: use_status
param.label: Use Status
param.description: If set to yes, you can choose a status for an entry.

param.name: installtodo
param.label: Install the DB
param.description: If set to yes, the table for the module gets added. Set to yes once, go to the admin panel and load the module, then set back to no again!
